title: Made in Europe and the Case for Industrial Realism [Promoted Content]
summary_full: Europe is entering a phase where industrial policy choices have direct economic and strategic consequences. In a world marked by subsidies, export restrictions and distorted competition, openness alone is no longer enough to sustain Europe’s industrial base. How Europe uses its market and public spending will increasingly determine whether industrial value creation happens here or […]
